price: 41. OhNkolo wa biso! Limbisangai na baboti ba ngai,(1) na bandimi o mokolo mwa lifuta.
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ
footnotes: 1 Baboti ba ngai: Alobaki yango liboso ya koyeba ete tata naye azalaki monguna ya Allah, tango ayebi akabuani naye.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
